java.lang.String.value:
This library will help by preparing an offline FullSync database to be downloaded or installed within an Mobile Application.
This is usefull for preparing large offline databases that will be downloaded once and then synced for updates.
void connector, replace or don't use it
The fullsync database name you want to prepare. This has to be the same name of an existing FullSync connector
(optional) The zip destination, relative to the projects folder. If the path is empty or invalid, the default destination is used.
(optional) The base is prepared for the specified user
(optional) Start a fresh replication, remove the previous tempory database
